title: Replace .release. files with tag-based filtering
description:
Replace 21 .release. files with a tag-based content filtering approach.

## Current State
- Files named `<name>.release.<ext>` are renamed to `<name>.<ext>` during release via packager.bzl
- Separate files for dev vs release content

## New Approach
- Use `# RELEASE-CONTENT-START` / `# RELEASE-CONTENT-END` tags in single files
- During release, keep ONLY content between tags, strip everything else
- Merge .release.bzl implementations into main .bzl files

## Key Changes
1. Create content_filter.py tool in packager
2. Merge 21 .release. files into their counterparts
3. Update release_archive to filter instead of rename

See plan: ~/.claude/plans/async-gathering-knuth.md
